attributes.action: Stop persons claiming benefits from being able to claim (sue) the council for highways accidents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For persons who claim 'social' should be xempt from claiming against any accidents that happen on the highway because they have not contributing towards the maintenance of the pavements/roads. 

With knowledge of people who do this as a 'top up' to there financial gain it highlights how easy it is the council pay out.

If this were implimented it would save many councils millions of pounds a year.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
